lead_paragraph: Formula One team bosses have voted Lewis Hamilton the sport's best driver, despite the Briton losing his title to Mercedes team mate Nico Rosberg, in an annual Autosport magazine poll.

headline.print_headline: F1 Bosses Vote Hamilton Best Driver, Rosberg Third
headline.main: F1 Bosses Vote Hamilton Best Driver, Rosberg Third

snippet: Formula One team bosses have voted Lewis Hamilton the sport's best driver, despite the Briton losing his title to Mercedes team mate Nico Rosberg, in an annual Autosport magazine poll....
